summary: An honest encounter specialist's life begins to change with the arrival of a new police commissioner who has ties with a local don.
cast: Nana Patekar|Revathi|Yashpal Sharma|Mohan Agashe|Nakul Vaid|Jeeva|Kunal Vijaykar|Pravin Patel|Prasad Purandhare|Hrishitaa Bhatt|Neha Bam|Dibyendu Bhattacharya|Megan Cocks|Helen|Anant Jog|Ravi Kale|Parvez Khan|Dinesh Lamba|Pawan Mahendru
title: Ab Tak Chhappan
